main event: On 2 August 1948, an attorney and his wife observed an unusual object in the sky over Columbus, Ohio, which changed shapes during their observation.
interesting points: The object was first seen as oblong and traveled slowly from north to south., The object was reported to be approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter., The object exhibited changes in shape, transitioning from oblong to circular and back., A thin trail of smoke was observed briefly but did not persist., The object made no sound and was visible for about 10 to 15 minutes.
